New Records: Jayson Tatum hit a buzzer-beating game-winning shot in overtime to lift the Celtics over the Raptors
Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum made a career-high 11 game-tying or go-ahead shots late in the game
The Celtics and Raptors had significant defensive struggles, especially the Raptors in protecting the rim
Pre-Game Insights: The Celtics were highlighted as a team to watch due to their strong perimeter defense
The Raptors were expected to perform well after a strong start in the first half
Post-Match Reflections: Jayson Tatum expressed confidence in his clutch performance despite a rough game
The Celtics' victory was seen as a crucial step towards their championship aspirations
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the 100th meeting between the Celtics and Raptors
The Celtics unveiled their City Edition jerseys for the game
Others: The Raptors struggled with three-point shooting early in the game
The Celtics had a strong bench performance led by Payton Pritchard and Sam Hauser
